claims.claim: UiPath automations processed more than 60 million transactions in four years
claims.quote: In just four years, UiPath automations have processed more than 60 million transactions at Omega Healthcare.
After implementing UiPath, Omega Healthcare is experiencing a 100% increase in worker productivity

claims.claim: 40% reduction in time spent on documentation tasks

claims.claim: 30% return on investment within the first year
claims.quote: These improvements not only enhance operational efficiency and cost savings for Omega Healthcare's customers but also deliver a 30% return on investment within the first year.
